pkgmetadata.longdescription: Test Robustness with Directed Acyclic Graphs // Provides robustness checks driven by directed acyclic graphs (DAGs). Given a 'dagitty' DAG object and a model specification, 'DAGassist' classifies variables by causal roles, flags problematic controls, and generates a report comparing the original model with minimal and canonical adjustment sets. Exports publication-grade reports in 'LaTeX', 'Word', 'Excel', or plain text. 'DAGassist' is built on 'dagitty', an 'R' package that uses the 'DAGitty' web tool (https://dagitty.net/) for creating and analyzing DAGs. Methods draw on Pearl (2009) doi:10.1017/CBO9780511803161 and Textor et al. (2016) doi:10.1093/ije/dyw341.
